item.title: Are we Trek yet?
item.description: This guide is intended to be a comprehensive look at the tech that Star Trek suggested to drive humanity forward ad astra per aspera. The emphasis is on innovations that don‚Äôt violate physics according to present consensus understanding. Go ahead and explore boldly. Are We Trek Yet? ‚Äì A guide for how close we are to Star Trek technology is a funny, revealing, and well-executed idea. It is somewhat comforting that at the time of this writing, eight of all the Star Trek technologies are readily available, and thirty-one are in progress. It only tracks Star Trek technology, though.
